page.title: 17Transport - Buying a car
page.content: North St Helens has two major{vehicle {dealers}.At Windle Island are{Dutton {James}who sell{Renault}a leading {French}company and{ST.Helens Ford}at City Road sell Fords:Both firms sell a wide range of vehicles inculding{vans} {Renault's}most popular car is the {Renault 5}and{Ford's}is the{Sierra.} Both firms sell about{200}vehicles a year and both offer{guarantee}but at Ford you can buy extra.Both also sell used cars of other makes.Both have large workshops but only Ford do M.O.T.s.At Renault the showrooms are open from{9-7 Mon-Fri,9-5 Sat,12-5 Sun and the pumps are open{24 hrs,}so they don't have watchmen.Ford have watchmen and T.V.cameras to protect the vehicles from theft and vandalism.Ford do not sell fuel,there opening times for the showrooms are{9-8 Mon-Fri,9-6 { Sat,10.30-6 Sun.}
